comments.author: n0ne
comments.body: Quote from: profitpal on March 06, 2023, 01:58:45 PMYes , you heard it rightI have an insider info for the women indian premier league match which will begin in just 5 minutes from nowMatch isMumbai Vs BangloreBanglore will win as its fixedNow before putting allegations Read my full postI know odds are just 2.1 so even if it wins its just 50% probability as that can be a luckBut what if I say I can give you 10/10 or 20/20 or even 50/50 straight without getting a lose , sounds impossible There are 50+ games left in this league and I'll be posting more free for you guys till you believe that I am right I want to become the most trusted and reputed membersm of this forum. I'm open to give more info and games to the moderatorsSo play and win as much as you canAlso remember. Follow my future posts for more free fix in this league nowStay tuned. I don't wanna make any statement on your allegations. It looks like you take the credit if Bangalore have won the match, if not it is your bad luck. It is good that you've got the best insider to provide you with the right information. If possible go find someone else who might even give insider information like which ball there'll be wicket and so on.Things weren't the same as the past. In the past players involved in such kind of activities for money. Nowadays opportunity missed is missed for ever. For this reason players find themselves good and never gets into match fixing.
